named-native-query.name: Editora.buscar
named-native-query.query: select * from public.editora edi where (cast(?1 as varchar) is null or edi.codigo = to_number(cast(?1 as varchar), '999999999')) and (cast(?2 as varchar) is null or upper(edi.nome) like upper('%' || cast(?2 as varchar) || '%')) order by edi.nome
